app.name: Meow SLA Sidebar
app.short_description: Shows SLA status for the current ticket based on assigned team.
app.long_description: Displays First Response and Resolution SLA timers with status badges (Healthy, Nearing Breach, Breached) based on which team currently owns the ticket. Supports L0, L1-L3, ConnectX, AT&T, and Airvet with different SLA targets per team and priority. Click to expand escalation history.
app.installation_instructions: Install the app. Optionally configure group name mappings in the settings to match your Zendesk group names to SLA tiers.
